section.settings.show_announcement | filter: '%}' -%}

      <div>
    {%- else -%}
      <a href="{{ section.settings.link }}" >
    {%- endif -%}

    {%- if section.settings.link == blank -%}
      </div>
    {%- else -%}
      </a>
    {%- endif -%}

  {%- endif -%}
{%- endif -%}
